news_items.content: Here is the rewritten list of news articles:
- "Check out the latest news in Chennai on The Times of India with a wide range of topics including Chennai's politics, Chennai crime, sports, fashion, Kollywood, and more."
- "Chennai News Today: Find Chennai latest news and headlines on weather updates, entertainment, politics, schools, crime, festivals, and real estate."

- "Top stories · Trump admin calls for calm as Israel strikes Syria amid Druze–Bedouin clashes: 'We're very concerned about it' · Trump says US 'very close' to trade agreements with Japan and South Korea."
- "'No Coalition In Tamil Nadu': Palaniswami's 'AIADMK Single Largest Party' Snub To BJP · 'If Stalin Attended...': Vadivelu Misses Wedding Of Actor King Kong's cousin in Chennai".

- "Latest News · Father of children found with Russian mother in Karnataka cave seeks shared custody · 'Australia found out against India…': Ravi Shastri tells Indian cricket team about Australian bowler Mitchell Starc's actions."
- "Delhi-Goa IndiGo flight pilot declared ‘PAN-PAN’ before diverting flight to Mumbai; what does it mean?"
- "Kin of murdered Yemeni refuses pardon for Nimisha Priya".
- "Military AI contracts awarded to Anthropic, OpenAI, Google, and xAI · AI is rewriting the rules of the insurance industry · IBM Power11 targets enterprise AI development".

- "National-Security Concerns Tie Up Trump's U.A.E. · Drones, AI and Robot Pickers: Meet the Fully Autonomous Farm · Oracle Is No Longer AI's Dark Horse · Alibaba-Listed companies accelerate AI development in India."
- "The latest news and top stories on artificial intelligence, including AI chatbots like Microsoft's ChatGPT, Apple's AI Chatbot and Google's Bard".

- "Meta's Zuckerberg bets hundreds of billions on AI data centers · Musk suggests Tesla investor vote on xAI investment, rules out merger · Artist transforms Messi's artwork with AI-generated images".
